column1: # Zemp et al. (2019)
# Glacier mass changes for region 08-SCA                                                       #
# Year: hydrological year                                                                      #
# B_INT_mwe: specific mass-change rate (m w.e. yr-1) based on spatial interpolation
# B_AVG_mwe: specific mass-change rate (m w.e. yr-1) based on arithmetic averaging             #
# B_AW_mwe: specific mass-change rate (m w.e. yr-1) based on area-weighted averaging           #
# sig_Glac_mwe: uncertainty related to glaciological variability (m w.e. yr-1)                 #
# sig_Geod_mwe: uncertainty related to geodetic value (m w.e. yr-1)                            #
# sig_Int_mwe: uncertainty related to regional interpolation (m w.e. yr-1)                     #
# sig_Total_mwe: total uncertainty of  specific mass-change (m w.e. yr-1)                      #
# Area_AW_ref_km2: regional area (km2) based on RGI60 and area-weighted change rate
# Area_LW_km2: regional area (km2) based on RGI60 and time-series-length-weighted change rate  #
# dM_INT_Gt: regional mass-change rate (Gt yr-1) based on spatial interpolation
# dM_AVG_Gt: regional mass-change rate (Gt yr-1) based on arithmetic averaging                 #
# dM_AW_Gt: regional mass-change rate (Gt yr-1) based on area-weighted averaging               #
# sig_Glac_Gt: uncertainty related to glaciological variability (Gt yr-1)                      #
# sig_Geod_Gt: uncertainty related to geodetic value (Gt yr-1)                                 #
# sig_Int_Gt: uncertainty related to regional interpolation (Gt yr-1)                          #
# sig_Area_Gt: uncertainty related to regional glacier area (Gt yr-1)                          #
# sig_Crossed_Gt: 2nd order crossed uncertainty (Gt yr-1)                                      #
# sig_Total_Gt: total uncertainty of regional mass-change rate (Gt yr-1)                       #
Year
